main event: A round metallic object, approximately 100 ft. in diameter, was observed hovering north of Worden, Oregon on April 7, 1960.
interesting points: The object was white in color and emitted a swishing sound., The observation lasted for approximately 3-5 minutes., The object was reported to be one single entity., This sighting is classified as an Unidentified Flying Object., The duration of the sighting was consistent with the time noted.
witness description: a resident near the observation location with no prior flying experience and moderate contact with aviation.
